(a) ek aayathanayak sahitha tendarkaruweku, ho ek ek aayathanayak lesa sanwidhanathmakawa ha kriyathmaka wana uparima 3 samagam walin samanwitha hawul wyaparayak ho ee ha samana hawulkarithwayak saha konthrath kalamanakaranaya pilibanda pramukha hawulkaruta purna palanaya athi, (aa) hawul wyapara ho ee ha samana hawulkarithwayan sandaha eeyam sahakaru saha ehi anubaddha samagam dekema eekabaddha ha thani wagakim; (a) nayakayeku saha thani anubaddha aayathanayakin samanwitha hawul wyaparawala ho ee ha samana hawulkarithwayakadi, eeyam hawulkaruta hawul wyaparaye ho hawulkarithwaye awama 51 kotas thibiya yuthu athara anubaddhithayata awama 30 kotas thibiya yuthuya.
